column3: Latest;Kratie: ------ On the afternoon on 10 May 2019 an endangered freshwater dolphin was found dead in the Mekong River near Kratie City
column4: Kratie Province. It was a female dolphin
column5: over 2 meters long weighing 191 kilograms from a group living in Anlong Kampei.------The cause of death not yet clear
column6: but there were no outward signs of injury.------Wildlife officials will investigate along with the WWf and the Provincial Department of Agriculture
column7: Forestry and Fisheries for a clear cause of the dolphinâ€™s death.------A ------dead baby dolphin------ was found in March in Stung Treng. A ------survey------ released in 2019 said there were 92 dolphins living in the Cambodian stretch of the Mekong.
